column1: Uchi////).  So good!  This delightful dish comes out in a piping hot stone or clay bowl.  In the bowl is rice
column3: and an egg.  At the table
column4: they pour soy broth in the bowl and mix it as the dish cooks before your eyes.  The more I ate of this dish
column5: the more I loved it.  The rice becomes really crispy and has great flavor. (5 out of 5).
